entity.description: George R.R. Martin's best-selling book series `A Song of Ice and Fire' is brought to the screen as HBO sinks its considerable storytelling teeth into the medieval fantasy epic. It's the depiction of two powerful families - kings and queens, knights and renegades, liars and honest men - playing a deadly game for control of the Seven Kingdoms of Westeros, and to sit atop the Iron Throne. Martin is credited as a co-executive producer and one of the writers for the series, which was filmed in Northern Ireland and Malta.

tweets.text: Daily dose of poisonous hydrogen sulphide has arrived early in Hartshill-c5 miles from Walleys Landfill-today. Normally get gassed evening/night time. No chance we can go along with government COVID guidance to keep homes ventilated.  #StopTheStink @PHE_uk @EnvAgencyMids

@AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @EnvAgencyMids @PHE_uk @JournoJess_ respiratory paediatrician at Royal Stoke confirming a rise in cases of children showing new respiratory symptoms connected to Walley‚Äôs Quarry gases! urls.title: Water firms are main source of microplastics in UK rivers, study says
urls.description: Research says discharge of untreated sewage and wastewater during dry spells to blame

tweets.text:
Important new research out today by @Jamie_Woodward_ & others identifies water firms as the main source of microplastics in UK rivers. 

Builds more pressure on government @EnvAgency to tackle the way water firms release untreated effluent into our rivers.
https://t.co/HKK1Ar0abP
